name: Ninja Escape (itch) (Camie, Penquen, Running_Stickman, Benev)
description:
A short co-op platformer made during the 2022 Global Game Jam, with the theme of duality.

Ninja:

Work with your robot companion who can defend you from incoming missiles to climb the tower and find what you seek at the goal above.

Robot:

Work with the ninja you follow who can jump and climb walls, but is surprisingly vulnerable to missiles.
